original_text: And you became imitators of us and of the Lord, for you received the word in much affliction, with the joy of the Holy Spirit,
korean_text: 또 너희는 많은 환난 가운데서 성령의 기쁨으로 말씀을 받아 우리와 주를 본받은 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: And you became imitators of us and of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희는 우리와 주의 본이 되었고

sentences.original_text: for you received the word in much affliction
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 많은 환난 가운데서 말씀을 받았음이라

sentences.original_text: with the joy of the Holy Spirit
